sentences.en: A : It's to commemorate the founder of the university, Cheng , She - wo.
sentences.cn: 为了纪念学校的创办人和老校长成舍我.

sentences.en: A 18 CD box set to commemorate Sam's 30 th anniversary of music.
sentences.cn: 歌神许冠杰乐坛三十周年纪念套装(18CD).

sentences.en: a parade to commemorate the town’s bicentenary
sentences.cn: 庆祝该镇建立200周年的游行

sentences.en: A series of movies will be shown to commemorate the 30th anniversary of his death.
sentences.cn: 为纪念他逝世30周年，有一系列的电影要上映。

sentences.en: A special version of "Casablanca" is being released on video to commemorate the film's 50th birthday.
sentences.cn: 为纪念该片上映50周年，准备发行《北非谍影》的特别版录像带。

sentences.en: Celebrations planned to commemorate the 30 th anniversary of independence were cancelled.
sentences.cn: 纪念独立30周年的庆典被取消了.

sentences.en: In order to commemorate the day, they nicknamed It'singles Day.
sentences.cn: 为了纪念这一天, 他们给它命名为 “ 王老五骗子节”.

sentences.en: It has great realistic significance for us to commemorate the day.
sentences.cn: 今天,我们纪念“九·一八”事变70周年具有重大的现实意义.

sentences.en: Marble Arch was added to commemorate British Victories at Waterloo and Trafalgar.
sentences.cn: 大理石曲拱增加纪念英国在滑铁卢和特拉法尔加战役的胜利.

sentences.en: May 5 after a year to commemorate the dragon boat racing.
sentences.cn: 之后每年五月五日划龙舟以纪念之.

sentences.en: Some galleries commemorate donors by inscribing their names on the walls.
sentences.cn: 一些美术馆把捐赠者的姓名镌刻在墙上以示纪念。

sentences.en: The new stamps were issued to commemorate the coronation of the king.
sentences.cn: 发行新邮票以纪念国王加冕典礼.

sentences.en: The Nobel Prize is awarded to commemorate Nobel the great chemist.
sentences.cn: 颁发诺贝尔奖,是为了纪念伟大的化学家诺贝尔.

sentences.en: This building was built to commemorate the Fire of London.
sentences.cn: 这栋大楼是为纪念“伦敦大火”而兴建的.

sentences.en: To commemorate a great patriotic poet of China: Qu Yuan.
sentences.cn: 是为了纪念中国伟大的爱国诗人: 屈原.

sentences.en: We commemorate the founding of our nation with a public holiday.
sentences.cn: 我们放假一日以庆祝国庆.

trans.tran_en: to do something to show that you remember and respect someone important or an important event in the past
